  • Element
com.iciql

Annotation Type Iciql.IQTable


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public static @interface Iciql.IQTable
    Annotation to define a table.

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      boolean annotationsOnly
      If true, only fields that are explicitly annotated as IQColumn are mapped.
      boolean create
      Whether or not iciql tries to create the table and indexes.
      boolean inheritColumns
      The inherit columns allows this model class to inherit columns from its super class.
      boolean memoryTable
      If true, this table is created as a memory table where data is persistent, but index data is kept in main memory.
      java.lang.String name
      The table name.
      java.lang.String[] primaryKey
      The primary key may be optionally specified.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The table name. If not specified the class name is used as the table name.

        The table name may still be overridden in the define() method if the model class is not annotated with IQTable. Default: unspecified.

        Default:
        ""

      • primaryKey

        public abstract java.lang.String[] primaryKey
        The primary key may be optionally specified. If it is not specified, then no primary key is set by the IQTable annotation. You may specify a composite primary key.
        • single column primaryKey: value = "id"
        • compound primary key: value = { "id", "name" }
        The primary key may still be overridden in the define() method if the model class is not annotated with IQTable. Default: unspecified.
        Default:
        {}

      • inheritColumns

        public abstract boolean inheritColumns
        The inherit columns allows this model class to inherit columns from its super class. Any IQTable annotation present on the super class is ignored. Default: false.
        Default:
        false

      • create

        public abstract boolean create
        Whether or not iciql tries to create the table and indexes. Default: true.
        Default:
        true

      • annotationsOnly

        public abstract boolean annotationsOnly
        If true, only fields that are explicitly annotated as IQColumn are mapped. Default: true.
        Default:
        true

      • memoryTable

        public abstract boolean memoryTable
        If true, this table is created as a memory table where data is persistent, but index data is kept in main memory. Valid only for H2 and HSQL databases. Default: false.
        Default:
        false
